EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Norman, We don’t need a W-9 just the I-9 signed and dated by you in section one and a local notary in section two. You can send to me via email or fax. Fax number is below. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Norman Davis [mailto:ndavis4@msn.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2012 11:29 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Next Steps Hi Sara,
I filled out the document and sentyou a pic of my passport. I have a w-9 and a I-9 to complete. Please confirm I can fax th ew-9 toyou tomorrow. Can you give me your fax number?
Thanks
Norman Davis From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> To: ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com> Date: Tue, 29 May 2012 15:46:01 -0400 Subject: Next StepsHi Norman ,
You need to complete the online enrollment which was just sent to you in a sepereate email (also attached.) Please log in and complete the online enrollment as soon as possible.
At the end, an I-9 will populate; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don't need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.)
Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions.
Thanks! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com>
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
-----Original Message----- From: Norman Davis [mailto:ndavis4@msn.com] <mailto:[mailto:ndavis4@msn.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 3:18 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Question
Perfect. What's needed on my part? Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T
-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Tue, 29 May 2012 19:15:41 To: <ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com>> Subject: RE: Question
Hi Norman,
Sure did, she is very nice and said she will send our agreement to legal and we will start the process. I asked her to copy you on all communications so we could keep you in the loop.
Thanks! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

NO worries at all...I will get this taken care of for you ASAP.
Thanks, Sara

Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T
-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Tue, 29 May 2012 16:41:57 To: <ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com>> Subject: RE: Question
Hi Norman,
May I have her email so I can send over our contract and introduce myself and give background on MBO?
Thanks, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

-----Original Message----- From: Norman Davis [mailto:ndavis4@msn.com] <mailto:[mailto:ndavis4@msn.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 12:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Question
Hi Sara I would like to utilize your services for my new position. The company is Bluewater that you will be dealing with. The contact is Emily White 212.324.4327. I would like to wrap this up as soon as possible. Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T
-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Fri, 18 May 2012 14:50:29 To: <ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com>> Subject: RE: Question
Hi Norman,
At the end of the year you are considered a W-2 employee of MBO Partners for tax purposes. MBO will issue you a W-2 and you file We like regular employee. We do not prepare taxes but the cost to prepare you taxes (if you even need help) should be reduced since you no longer will have a complicated 1099 and schedule C.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions.
Thank you, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

-----Original Message----- From: Norman Davis [mailto:ndavis4@msn.com] <mailto:[mailto:ndavis4@msn.com]> Sent: Friday, May 18, 2012 9:32 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Question
Hello Sara , We spoke the other day regarding my enrollment. My question is in the eyes of the govt would I be considered a W-2 of MBO or 1099 independent? Are my end of year taxes included in the pkg?
Thanks Norman Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T
--Forwarded Message Attachment-- From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> To: ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com> Date: Tue, 29 May 2012 15:43:34 -0400 Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment InformationDear Norman, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A4AF6B83A4A3B0513780>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you.
